body.name: Febreze Wall Plug in Air Fresheners, Unstopables Fresh, Odor Fighter for Strong Odors, Scented Oil Refill (3 Count)
body.couponInfo: Save an extra 30% on your first Subscribe and Save order.
features: Contains (3) Unstopables scented oil refills of 26 mL each (78 mL Total) for Febreze PLUG with Fade Defy Technology
fights odors and fills your home with an irresistibly bold scent
Treats your nose to a can't-miss fresh that lasts 50 days (on low)
Transform your world with the airy laundry vibes of Unstopables Fresh... who has time to do actual laundry, anyways?
Low-level indicator light feature lets you know when it's time to change out your oil refill
body.description: Your home will smell scentastic and smell-free thanks to the Febreze Unstopables PLUG with Fade Defy Technology. It fights odors while filling the air with an intensely bold scent. With its digitally controlled scent release, Febreze Fade Defy technology delivers that freshness you crave for 50 days (on a low setting), so you can ditch the fade and keep on sniffing. Unstopables Fresh takes your senses to airy new heights with the invigorating scent of clean laundry. Just plug the warmer into a high-traffic area of your home, choose your scent intensity, and breathe in the tantalizing freshness of Unstopables all day long. It's a great addition anywhere in the house: We're talking living rooms, bedrooms, and hallways. Not only that, when your refill gets too low, the handy low-level indicator light lets you know when it's time to swap. Want to take that continuous freshness on the road? Grab a Febreze Unstopables CAR Vent Clip and show car odors who's boss.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Febreze Unstopables Comes in All Shapes and Sizes Refresh, re-wear, repeat: Boldly freshen up all your worn-in, sat-on, funked-up fabrics. Spray the stink away in any and all spaces that need an explosion of fresh. Melt all your home odors away with some undeniably scentastic freshness. Don’t stink and drive: Clip in and ride with one fiercely fresh copilot.

Febreze Unstopables Air Freshener Febreze Unstopables Fabric Refresher Febreze Unstopables Car Air Freshener Febreze Unstopables Plug Air Freshener Febreze Unstopables Wax Melts Up to 2X Scent Power of base Febreze ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Eliminates Air Odors ✓ ✓ ✓ Eliminates Fabric OdorsEliminates Fabric Odors ✓ Works for 30 Days ✓ Keeps rooms smelling fresh for 1200 hours ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It works really well. I like that I can control the amount of scent it releases. I love the scent I chose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long lasting, great scent
reviews.reviewText: This one plug in fragrances the whole front portion of my home with a beautiful fresh scent. It has lasted a long time so far and I like how I can lower the scent if needed. I recommend for sure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells better than others
reviews.reviewText: I bought a couple febreeze plug-ins that came with the default “linen & sky” scent. I have to say, my house smelled AWFUL that evening, almost like a porta-potty. A clean porta-potty, but still. Even on the lowest setting, we all had headaches and had to unplug them. I promptly ordered this scent as I’ve used it before in the portable air freshener format. It smells great! It’s subtle and keeps the house smelling fresh.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Warmer Short Life Span?
reviews.reviewText: I’m not sure if I’m the only one who experiences this, but I feel like the warmer itself don’t last too long. The refills obviously will last, depending on how much you’re using it and on which setting, but I feel like the warmer itself eventually stops warming at a certain extent and doesn’t give off that fragrant smell as it would when you first purchase one of these. Good for the money it’s worth however and quality. Easy to use and basically runs itself once plugged into a wall outlet. I would recommend maybe getting two of these, placing them on lower settings if you have a larger space to cover such as an apartment and a few smaller ones for enclosed spaces such as bathrooms or closets. My front door to my loft is a little far from the living area so me or guests smelling the fragrance upon entering lets me know they are working and keeping the house smelling good. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars fresh, not overpowering smell. I will see how long it lasts.
reviews.reviewText: Used it in my bathroom. Put it on minimum scent and that was just fine. Much better than using the standing air freshners that don't last long. I just put it in that room so will see how long it lasts. Thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Smell, Great Indicator Light
reviews.reviewText: I always loves this scent and these plugs. The new light they have is a nice addition so you know when to actually replace the solution. Besides the light is essentially the same design they had for years. There is a button on top you can slide to adjust the scent output, I tend to keep it in between the bathroom and living room. I place the bottom on top to the middle position and both rooms usually stay fresh smelling that way. Also i keep one near my garbage can to mask any smell prior to it feeling up and it does the trick. I would recommend this product when people come by my place they always say my house smells good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice scent not over powering smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, effective
reviews.reviewText: Arrived on time, easy to plug and play.
Hands down the best plug in freshener ever.
In my opinion, this is the best febreze scent. I hope it comes available again

reviews.reviewTitle: I liked it, husband hated it
reviews.reviewText: My husband hated the smell of this one so I put the lavender ones in and he liked those ones. This smell is pretty strong and artificial so I can understand why he wasn’t a fan. I was okay with it because it did get rid of the the smells of dog and a musty smell that came into a spare room this spring. My husband said it gave him a headache as soon as he walked into the house and if I tried to plug it in without telling him he knew almost immediately! If someone is sensitive to this scent or dislikes it, it’s a strong scent and the sensitivity is legit. I even tried putting it in the furthest corner of the house and turning it on low while he was sleeping to see if he would be okay if he was accustomed to it- nope 👎! Whatever they put in this is like the smell of evil to my hubby 😆 it’s not an awesome smell imo, it’s okay, but definitely not worth a fuss.Be aware if you have company over that they might be sensitive to it as well, increasingly people have more scent allergies so it’s important to be aware that the strong scents can cause serious distress.If you have a bunch of teenage boys or something this might be good for a lot of smelly guys who don’t care about hygiene or if you have a smell you’re trying to fight that’s pretty toxic this could be the lead toxic of two options lol 😂I got it because it was on sale, I will never buy it again and had to shower off after disposing of the scent unit before my husband would come near me again 😆 the smell does get in your hair and things!
